cards.name: Velarok Windblade
cards.text: While this is in your hand, play three cards from other classes to reveal Velarok's true form! ( left!) (Ready!)
cards.flavorText: His deceptive manipulations have dug the Bloodrock Company into a hole they can't get out of.

cards.name: Mes'Adune the Fractured
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental. Split it into two halves.
cards.flavorText: Cracking open an elemental with the boys.

cards.name: Slagmaw the Slumbering
cards.text: Rush, Taunt Dormant for 8 turns. (Excavate to awaken 2 turns sooner!)
cards.flavorText: You delved too greedily and too deep. You know what they awoke in the darkness of the Badlands: Rush and Taunt.

cards.name: Badlands Brawler
cards.text: Battlecry: Start a Brawl! If you've Excavated twice, this always wins.
cards.flavorText: Watch out watch out watch out - R.K.O. outta nowhere!

cards.name: Reno, Lone Ranger
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, empty the enemy board and limit it to 1 minion for a turn. It's high noon!
cards.flavorText: With an uncertain past and a questionable future, Reno was lucky to find his home on the range.

cards.name: Reinforced Plating
cards.text: Gain 6 Armor. Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: I am become death, destroyer of azerite.

cards.name: Misfire
cards.text: Deal 3, 2, and 1 damage to random minions. Quickdraw: Choose the targets.
cards.flavorText: "Me should not have taken candle."

cards.name: Boomboss Tho'grun
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 T.N.T. into your deck. When drawn, blow up a card in the enemy hand, deck, and battlefield.
cards.flavorText: Ever since the Bloodrock Company hired this guy, business has been booming!

cards.name: Blast Charge
cards.text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion. Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: Your Blast spells have +1 Attack.

cards.name: Unlucky Powderman
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Give Taunt minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: Welp, guess I'll die... again.

cards.name: Detonation Juggernaut
cards.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Give Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: Did you really need a whole giant mecha-suit just for one bundle of dynamite?

cards.name: Blast Tortoise
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions equal to this minion's Attack.
cards.flavorText: Who's that minion? ... Iiiiit's Blast Tortoise! "Blast tortoise."

cards.name: Battlepickaxe
cards.text: After you play a Taunt minion, gain +1 Durability.
cards.flavorText: You can pick your battles, and you can pick your axes, but you can't uh… pick your friends' battlepickaxes?

cards.name: The Badlands Bandits
cards.text: Get eight 3/2 Bandits with bonus effects. Any that can't fit in your hand are summoned instead.
cards.flavorText: Bandits... ASSEMBLE!

cards.name: Living Horizon
cards.text: Taunt, Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
cards.flavorText: Even in the darkest of days, the sun never sets on the Badlands.

cards.name: Lawful Longarm
cards.text: Rush, Lifesteal Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your hand.
cards.flavorText: Loves to lob law bombs from his law blog.

cards.name: Lay Down the Law
cards.text: Tradeable Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Quickdraw: Then deal 1 damage to it.
cards.flavorText: The official term for "Because I said so!".

cards.name: Holy Cowboy
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next Holy spell costs (2) less.
cards.flavorText: Wait, but… Isn't he more of a 'holy kodoboy'?

cards.name: Hi Ho Silverwing
cards.text: Divine Shield Deathrattle: Draw a Holy spell.
cards.flavorText: I swear this minion had 3000 Attack at one point!

cards.name: Deputization Aura
cards.text: Your left-most minion has +3 Attack and Lifesteal. Lasts 3 turns.
cards.flavorText: You're my favorite deput- oh. You died… Ok just kidding, THAT guy is my favorite deputy.

cards.name: Showdown!
cards.text: Both players summon three 3/3 Outlaws. Give yours Rush.
cards.flavorText: An epic confrontation between the outlaws and the in-laws.

cards.name: Prismatic Beam
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.
cards.flavorText: Seven colors of the rainbow, one for each enemy minion.

cards.name: Spirit of the Badlands
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, get a permanent Mirage.
cards.flavorText: That's the spirit! Of the Badlands.

cards.name: Ten Gallon Hat
cards.text: Draw a minion. Give it +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Get a Ten Gallon Hat."
cards.flavorText: It actually only holds three quarters of a gallon, but that doesn't sound as good.

cards.name: Bounty Wrangler
cards.text: Quickdraw or Combo: Get a Coin.
cards.flavorText: With a smile like that and Coins in her hands, she's one greedy grinner.

cards.name: Stick Up
cards.text: Discover a Quickdraw card from another class.
cards.flavorText: Dude, Velarok, give me a minute to play my turn, the rope's burning!

cards.name: Shell Game
cards.text: Get a random Epic, Rare, and Common card from other classes.
cards.flavorText: I thiiink… It's under all three of 'em!

cards.name: Wishing Well
cards.text: After you play a Coin, get a random Legendary minion from another class and set its Cost to (1).
cards.flavorText: Wishing upon a star? Pssshhh, that's so childish. Anyways, let me throw all my Coins into this well.

cards.name: Dart Throw
cards.text: Throw two 2 damage darts at random enemy minions. (If both hit the same minion, get a Coin!)
cards.flavorText: Did you know: Hitting the same target twice is only for skilled players. This has been a 'Dart Fact'!

cards.name: Bovine Skeleton
cards.text: Deathrattle: If this has 4 or more Attack, summon a Bovine Skeleton.
cards.flavorText: The secret cow level has been unearthed.

cards.name: Starshooter
cards.text: After your hero attacks, get an Arcane Shot.
cards.flavorText: Shoot for the stars! And if you miss, just don't hit me.

cards.name: Camouflage Mount
cards.text: Give a minion +3/+3 and a random bonus effect. When it dies, summon a Chameleon.
cards.flavorText: What mount? I don't see anything…

cards.name: Triple Sevens
cards.text: Deal 7 damage to a minion. Draw 7 cards.
cards.flavorText: If you count the 'seven' in the name, there's actually four total 7s, not three. Huge oversight from the designers.

cards.name: Bloodrock Co. Shovel
cards.text: Deathrattle: Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: The 'mpany' is silent.

cards.name: Antique Flinger
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, destroy an enemy minion.
cards.flavorText: One man's treasure is another man's statue to the face.

cards.name: Drilly the Kid
cards.text: Battlecry, Quickdraw, and Deathrattle: Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: "I HATE that nickname. Call me Drilliam!"

cards.name: Pocket Sand
cards.text: Deal 3 damage. Quickdraw: Your opponent's next card costs (1) more.
cards.flavorText: I was only trying to get it in your eyes, man. YOU didn't need to open your mouth like that!

cards.name: Fan the Hammer
cards.text: Deal 6 damage split among the lowest Health enemies.
cards.flavorText: I thought Kurtrus was more of a fan of glaives.

cards.name: Gunslinger Kurtrus
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fire 6 random 2 damage shots at minions in the enemy's hand.
cards.flavorText: "I have given up (a single copy of) EVERYTHING! What have YOU sacrificed?"

cards.name: Snake Eyes
cards.text: Battlecry: Roll two dice, then Discover two cards of those Costs. (Doubles get an extra Discover!)
cards.flavorText: Hey, put ALL of your hands on the table!

cards.name: Midnight Wolf
cards.text: Rush Outcast: Summon a copy of this.
cards.flavorText: Three of these would make for an EPIC T-shirt.

cards.name: Bartend-O-Bot
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw an Outcast card and slide it to the left side of your hand.
cards.flavorText: Bartend-O-Bot! Make my Outcast card DO SOMETHING!

cards.name: Parched Desperado
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
cards.flavorText: I'm green And I'm about to die Da ba dee da ba di

cards.name: Oasis Outlaws
cards.text: Discover a Naga. If you've played a Naga while holding this, reduce its Cost by (1).
cards.flavorText: With their oasis polluted by the Bloodrock Mining Company, Snake Eyes has set aside her differences with the outlaws of the Badlands to put an end to Bloodrock's operation.

cards.name: Load the Chamber
cards.text: Deal 2 damage. Your next Naga, Fel spell, and weapon cost (1) less.
cards.flavorText: Wait! Before we duel, I gotta install these shaders.

cards.name: Blindeye Sharpshooter
cards.text: After you play a Naga, deal 2 damage to a random enemy and draw a spell. (Then switch!) After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage to a random enemy and draw a Naga. (Then switch!)
cards.flavorText: "Bullseye… I think."

cards.name: Azerite Vein
cards.text: Secret: When the enemy plays a card on the turn that it entered their hand, get a copy that costs (0).
cards.flavorText: When the ground trembles near it, are those earthquakes or heartbeats?

cards.name: Heat Wave
cards.text: Deal 2 damage to an enemy minion and its neighbors. Quickdraw: To all enemies instead.
cards.flavorText: This is the hottest summer of your life so far.

cards.name: Stargazing
cards.text: Draw a different Arcane spell. If you play it this turn, it casts twice.
cards.flavorText: See those dots up there? Those are called "stars." Except for that one. That's called an "airplane."

cards.name: Sunset Volley
cards.text: Deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies. Summon a random 10-Cost minion.
cards.flavorText: When the light is just right during Golden Hour, that is when you take out the selfie stick and start casting.

cards.name: Tae'thelan Bloodwatcher
cards.text: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (4) less (but not less than 1).
cards.flavorText: He's a big fan of Control Death Knight live streams.

cards.name: Reliquary Researcher
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, cast two random Mage Secrets.
cards.flavorText: What good is a researcher if they're just gunna keep it all a secret?

cards.name: Overflow Surger
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this for each turn in a row you've played an Elemental. ( )
cards.flavorText: The drip on this elemental is straight fire!

cards.name: Cryopreservation
cards.text: Freeze an enemy. Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: Remember to take the elementals out of the freezer before Mom gets home!

cards.name: Rheastrasza
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon the Purified Dragon Nest.
cards.flavorText: Rheastrasza ascends above loyalty to just her dragonflight to serve all dragonkind. She believes all flights deserve a future and will give her life for the future dragon prince.

cards.name: Desert Nestmatron
cards.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, refresh 4 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavorText: Not as sweet as the Dessert Nestmatron, but still just as refreshing!

cards.name: Rehydrate
cards.text: Restore 7 Health. Quickdraw: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavorText: Just doing our part as the Hearthstone development team in reminding you to drink more water!

cards.name: Dragon Tales
cards.text: Choose One - Get two random Dragons that cost (5) or less; or Get two that cost more than (5).
cards.flavorText: "Once upon a time, there was a maaaagical toy shop, filled with wonder and Dragons!"

cards.name: Take to the Skies
cards.text: Draw two Dragons. Give them +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: This is one step above reaching for the skies.

cards.name: Cactus Construct
cards.text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon a 1/2 copy of it.
cards.flavorText: "I am not Malfurion! I am CACTUS LORD!"

cards.name: Splish-Splash Whelp
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
cards.flavorText: Little Whelpy, you're the one You make Mana lots of fun

cards.name: Spinetail Drake
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 5 damage to an enemy minion.
cards.flavorText: Mortal enemy of Cactus Cutter.

cards.name: Dragon Golem
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this for each Dragon in your hand.
cards.flavorText: I have a Dragon, I have a Golem. UH! Dragon Golem!

cards.name: Fye, the Setting Sun
cards.text: Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt Costs (1) less for each Dragon you've summoned this game.
cards.flavorText: There is a dragon way down in Bloodrock They call the Setting Sun

cards.name: Waste Remover
cards.text: At the end of your turn, destroy the bottom 3 cards of your deck.
cards.flavorText: Always follow the three Rs: REDUCE their world to ash, REUSE their bones as paperweights, and RECYCLE!

cards.name: Disposal Assistant
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Barrel of Sludge on the bottom of your deck.
cards.flavorText: A bright green liquid that people say is bad for you... That's either hazardous waste OR a new popular brand of soft drink.

cards.name: Sludge on Wheels
cards.text: Rush. Whenever this takes damage, get a Barrel of Sludge and add one to the bottom of your deck.
cards.flavorText: Cruisin' for an oozin'.

cards.name: Furnace Fuel
cards.text: When this is played, discarded, or destroyed, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: Remember Ultrasaur? This is him now. Feel old yet?

cards.name: Pop'gar the Putrid
cards.text: Your Fel spells cost (1) less and have Lifesteal. Battlecry: Get two Barrels of Sludge.
cards.flavorText: All around the arid badlands The Outlaws chased the Townsfolk Gerry had a train full of sludge POP! goes the sludge train

cards.name: Fracking
cards.text: Look at the bottom 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and destroy the others.
cards.flavorText: For fhe person who jusf cannof decide whaf card fo puf info a deck!

cards.name: Mo'arg Drillfist
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: Also functions as the town dentist.

cards.name: Smokestack
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it dies, Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: Don't worry, it's green energy!

cards.name: Tram Conductor Gerry
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, summon six 3/3 Tram Cars with Rush.
cards.flavorText: His name is pronounced like 'gif'.

cards.name: Spurfang
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast with Cost equal to this minion's Attack.
cards.flavorText: He's always smiling… Not by choice, but because it hurts to close his mouth.

cards.name: Sneaky Snakes
cards.text: Summon two 1/1 Snakes with Stealth.
cards.flavorText: You're a sneaky lil snake, aren'tcha?

cards.name: Silver Serpent
cards.text: Rush, Poisonous Quickdraw: Gain Immune this turn.
cards.flavorText: Skilled at exploring hidden temples.

cards.name: Saddle Up!
cards.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast that costs (3) or less."
cards.flavorText: And then they rode off into the sunset, not knowing they left their stove on.

cards.name: Giant Tumbleweed!!!
cards.text: Deal 6 damage to all minions. Summon a 6/6 Tumbleweed.
cards.flavorText: Skarr's second-biggest hobby after laying waste to the Badlands is bowling.

cards.name: Amphibious Elixir
cards.text: Restore 5 Health. Discover a spell.
cards.flavorText: Made by frogs, for frogs, from frogs.

cards.name: Trusty Companion
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+3. If it has a minion type, draw one of that type.
cards.flavorText: Textbook big-sibling and little-sibling relationship.

cards.name: Cactus Cutter
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If you cast it this turn, gain +1/+2 and Taunt.
cards.flavorText: Best friend of Spinetail Drake.

cards.name: Doctor Holli'dae
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, equip the Staff of the Nine Frogs.
cards.flavorText: If anything can heal the Badlands, it is the power of frogs!

cards.name: Walking Mountain
cards.text: Rush, Lifesteal, Mega-Windfury Overload: (2)
cards.flavorText: The hills are alive with the sound of YEEEEHAAAWWWW!

cards.name: Minecart Cruiser
cards.text: Rush, Overload: (2) Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, don't Overload.
cards.flavorText: Where are you drivin', Minecart Cruiser? Where is your bounty, fortune, and fame?

cards.name: Skarr, the Catastrophe
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemies (improved by each turn in a row you've played an Elemental).
cards.flavorText: We're not in Karazhan anymore, Reno.

cards.name: Pile of Bones
cards.text: Deathrattle: The next time you Excavate, resummon this.
cards.flavorText: It's a very well-organized pile, I'll give you that.

cards.name: Skeleton Crew
cards.text: Battlecry: Excavate a treasure. It costs (0).
cards.flavorText: They don't sweat, breathe or need lit candles... what more could you ask?

cards.name: Crop Rotation
cards.text: Summon four 1/1 Undead with Rush that die at the end of turn.
cards.flavorText: "Dave, you're never gunna believe this! The plants ARE the zombies!"

cards.name: Reska, the Pit Boss
cards.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this game. Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
cards.flavorText: Overseer of the Bloodrock Mine, Reska will work you to the bone. They'll then reanimate your bones and work THOSE bones to the bone.

cards.name: Fistful of Corpses
cards.text: Deal damage to a minion equal to your Corpses.
cards.flavorText: Technically, they're not Corpses YET.

cards.name: Corpse Farm
cards.text: Spend up to 8 Corpses to summon a random minion of that Cost.
cards.flavorText: It ain't much, but it's dishonest work.

cards.name: Farm Hand
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover an Undead. Quickdraw: It costs (2) less.
cards.flavorText: I know it's an Undead hand, but bending your pinky in that way can NOT be good for your joints.

cards.name: Maw and Paw
cards.text: At the end of your turn, gain 5 Corpses. At the start of your turn, spend 5 Corpses to give your hero +5 Health.
cards.flavorText: Home is where the disfigured, rotten heart is.

cards.name: Thirsty Drifter
cards.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each 1-Cost card you've played this game.
cards.flavorText: Quick! Someone bring her a Manathirst card!

cards.name: Pip the Potent
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy each 1-Cost card in your hand.
cards.flavorText: One time, I was trying to get Pip's attention to warn her that the dangerous outlaw Cheery Ollie, who also goes by just 'O', was headed her way. "Pip! Pip! Cheery O!", I shouted.

cards.name: Holy Springwater
cards.text: Restore 8 Health to a damaged character. Save any excess in a 1-Cost Bottle.
cards.flavorText: Issa bah oh auh woh ah!

cards.name: Invasive Shadeleaf
cards.text: Deal 8 damage to an enemy minion. Save any excess in a 1-Cost Bottle.
cards.flavorText: Don't throw shade, bottle it!

cards.name: Swarm of Lightbugs
cards.text: Summon 10 1/1 Lightbugs with Lifesteal. Save any excess in a 1-Cost Bottle.
cards.flavorText: No, I asked for 'lightNING in a bottle'!

cards.name: Injured Hauler
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to this minion. Overheal: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavorText: With how many cacti are all over the Badlands, this job has to be some sort of sick joke.

cards.name: Posse Possession
cards.text: Summon a 4/4 copy of a random minion in your opponent's hand.
cards.flavorText: Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and your shadows at gunpoint.

cards.name: Benevolent Banker
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from your deck. Quickdraw: Enemy deck instead.
cards.flavorText: "Oh no, you've got me confused. I'm Ben, the evil ent banker. I only work with evil trees!"

cards.name: Tram Heist
cards.text: Get a copy of each card your opponent played last turn.
cards.flavorText: How are they gunna steal the whole tram!?

cards.name: Dryscale Deputy
cards.text: Battlecry: The next time you draw a spell, get a copy of it.
cards.flavorText: He's here to tip the scales in our favor… and moisturize them too.

cards.name: Whelp Wrangler
cards.text: At the end of your turn, get a 1/2 Whelp with Taunt.
cards.flavorText: "Gosh darn it! How did these winged, airborne creatures manage to escape my knee-high, fenced enclosure AGAIN!?"

cards.name: Tram Mechanic
cards.text: Deathrattle: Get a Barrel of Sludge. TOXIC WASTE: Handle with care.
cards.flavorText: He looks at life through sludge-tinted glasses.

cards.name: Greedy Partner
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 2-Cost card, get a Coin.
cards.flavorText: "Don't worry, we'll evenly split the bounty. Then I'll have two evenly sized piles of gold!"

cards.name: Rowdy Partner
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 4-Cost card, deal 4 damage.
cards.flavorText: Rowdy, partner!

cards.name: Gaslight Gatekeeper
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
cards.flavorText: This girl is such a boss.

cards.name: Eroded Sediment
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Discover an Elemental from the past.
cards.flavorText: A perfect minion for those feeling sedimental about their past.

cards.name: Linedance Partner
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 3-Cost card, summon a random 3-Cost minion.
cards.flavorText: Where did you come from? (Linedance Partner's Battlecry) Where did you go? (Face)

cards.name: Dang-Blasted Elemental
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all minions except friendly Elementals.
cards.flavorText: We were told that "Dag-Nabbin' Dang-Blastin' Rootin'-Tootin' High-Falutin' Elemental" was too long.

cards.name: Cactus Rager
cards.text: Poisonous
cards.flavorText: What doesn't kill ya makes you deader.

cards.name: Horseshoe Slinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy minion. Quickdraw: And one of its neighbors.
cards.flavorText: Some people think this card is broken, but I think it's farrier than that.

cards.name: Gold Panner
cards.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: "I don't know why everyone's got their overalls in a jumble with Azerite minin' when there's all this GOLD for the takin'!"

cards.name: Miracle Salesman
cards.text: Deathrattle: Get a Tradeable Snake Oil.
cards.flavorText: "Hey! Hope you’re well. Have you ever wanted to be your own boss?"

cards.name: Trapdoor Spider
cards.text: Stealth, Poisonous After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
cards.flavorText: I can respect that they're important for the ecosystem, as long as you keep them waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay over there.

cards.name: Sunspot Dragon
cards.text: Tradeable, Lifesteal Quickdraw: Deal 6 damage.
cards.flavorText: THIS is why you shouldn't look directly at the sun.

cards.name: Saloon Brewmaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. Give it +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: Brewmaster Bru brought Barrelbrim bursting barrels of barely brewed barley brew. Barrelbrim bought Bru's barley brew, barring the barrels broken from the brazen brunch brawl.

cards.name: High Noon Duelist
cards.text: Deathrattle: Both players DRAW! Destroy the card that costs less.
cards.flavorText: "My ultimate is rea- ah, errr, I mean, I have enough Mana."

cards.name: Kingpin Pud
cards.text: Battlecry: Resurrect your Ogre-Gang. Give them Windfury.
cards.flavorText: The good, the bad, and the ugly stats for the Cost.

cards.name: Ogre-Gang Ace
cards.text: Rush Whenever this attacks, gain Divine Shield. (50% chance to gain Lifesteal instead.)
cards.flavorText: 100% chance to not play by the rules.

cards.name: Ogre-Gang Rider
cards.text: Rush 50% chance to give your hero +3 Attack this turn instead of attacking.
cards.flavorText: Doesn't know his ride from his left.

cards.name: Ogre-Gang Outlaw
cards.text: Rush 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
cards.flavorText: Why don't they just buy another hat?

cards.name: Gattlesnake
cards.text: At the end of your turn, load two bullets that deal 1 damage each. Deathrattle: Fire at random enemies!
cards.flavorText: He used to be an ordinary snake until he slithered through a saloon during a brawl and walked out looking like this.

cards.name: Bunny Stomper
cards.text: Your Beasts have Rush.
cards.flavorText: Has a PhD in stomputational chemistry.

cards.name: Azerite Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each turn in a row you've played an Elemental.
cards.flavorText: Either that giant isn't really giant, or that doorway is HUGE!

cards.name: Snake Oil Seller
cards.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 2 Tradeable Snake Oils into your opponent's deck.
cards.flavorText: This oil is absolutely essential to your gameplan.

cards.name: Howdyfin
cards.text: Whenever your hand has less than 3 cards in it, get a random Murloc.
cards.flavorText: You know who to blame if your drinking water tastes a little fishy.

cards.name: Cattle Rustler
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Beast. It costs (3) less.
cards.flavorText: What once started as a small-time cat burglary gig has turned into a life of cattle rustling. What a shame.

cards.name: Burrow Buster
cards.text: Rush Battlecry: Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: We almost went with the name "Giant Drill", but then it would've HAD to be an 8/8.

cards.name: Bounty Board
cards.text: Your Excavate, Quickdraw, Tradeable, and Legendary cards cost (1) less.
cards.flavorText: Reno's desire to be a face known around the Badlands might have backfired a little bit.

cards.name: Azerite Chain Gang
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry and Quickdraw: Summon a copy of this.
cards.flavorText: How long can this go on? For 6 years at least!

cards.name: Flint Firearm
cards.text: Battlecry: Get a random Quickdraw card. If you play it this turn, repeat this.
cards.flavorText: You'll never guess why they call him that.

cards.name: Trolley Problem
cards.text: Discard your lowest Cost spell. Summon two 3/3 Tram Cars with Rush. Quickdraw: Don't discard.
cards.flavorText: If only there were thousands of hypotheticals to prepare me for this moment!

cards.name: Theldurin the Lost
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, gain Immune this turn and attack all enemies.
cards.flavorText: He might be lost, but he knows where you can find these hands.

cards.name: Sheriff Barrelbrim
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have 20 or less Health, open the Badlands Jail.
cards.flavorText: Is that Sheriff Barrelbrim, owner of the Badlands Barrelbuilding?

cards.name: Reap What You Sow
cards.text: Deal 3 damage. Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: With a hat like that, I'd say their tailor did all of the sowing.

cards.name: Messenger Buzzard
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Beast. Give minions in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: The bird brings the word (which happens to be bird).

cards.name: Living Prairie
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 3/3 Cows with Rush.
cards.flavorText: Whoooooa, we're half way there Whooa-oh, -

cards.name: Kobold Miner
cards.text: Battlecry: Excavate a treasure.
cards.flavorText: A mining kobold that costs 2, has very low health, and gives you resources… what is this, Warcraft Rumble?

cards.name: Harrowing Ox
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, your next card this turn costs (7) less.
cards.flavorText: Dead or alive, you're pulling that plow.

cards.name: Elise, Badlands Savior
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon 4/4 copies of 4 random minions in your deck.
cards.flavorText: From the library to the field, she's proved herself to be a leading intellectual.

cards.name: Dehydrate
cards.text: Lifesteal. Deal 4 damage to a minion. Quickdraw: Costs (1).
cards.flavorText: JUST A LITTLE FURTHER LITTLE GUY, YOU CAN MAKE IT!!!

cards.name: Blastmage Miner
cards.text: Battlecry: Excavate a treasure. For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavorText: "So anyways, I started blastminin'!"

cards.name: Thunderbringer
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon an Elemental and Beast from your deck.
cards.flavorText: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't stop it from electrocuting everything in the water.
